    PooledArrays.DEFAULT_POOLED_REF_TYPE
    PooledArrays.PooledArray — Type.
    PooledArray(array, [reftype])

    Convert the given array to a PooledArray where each element will be referenced as an integer of the given type. If no reftype is specified one is chosen automatically based on the number of unique elements.
